Such a great experience. Rich Storytelling. Valve has this way of helping you learn the game without taking away from the actual experience. Not much in terms of replayability, but if you have not played through yourself I highly recommend purchasing this game and getting through it. Coop is very fun and is just the right amount of difficult, though this might vary for you if you haven't had a lot of experience. Well done Valve. Please give us Portal 3.
masterpiece. just as good, if not better than the first game

I wrote this review, a long time ago. Almost one year. And I can still confidently say this is the best gaming experience you will have. For just $10, you can have some of the best comedic timing, writing, storytelling and some of the deepest lore told through environment and game-play.
This is Valve's most recent (excluding Alyx) "real game", and it shows that they mastered the formula of story-based game-play and beautiful environments. If you want some of the best gaming imaginable, please pick up this game. If you enjoy it, check out Valve's catalog of games. They are fantastic and will leave you hooked.
Obviously if you're reading this review, you're interested. In the words of Cave Johnson, "When life gives you lemons, make lemonade."
very fun and love the action!
